name: Colectomy_CPT
title: Colectomy_CPT
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Colectomy Procedure.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Colectomy Procedure for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Colectomy Procedure for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Colectomy Procedure Codes that constitute the Clinical Grouping Lab for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
